availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert S. Taylor (Fayette County, Kentucky, barber)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, barber. Son of John Taylor and Charlotte Taylor. Married to Lucy J. Taylor. Father of Anna V. J. Taylor. Barber in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Barber in Lexington in 1860. Barber in Clark County, Ohio, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 198A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 3, p. 584.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 3, p. 258A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Clark County, OH, June 1863, p. 549.
KYR-0001-004-0453.
